name: Aria's Streampage
description:
This game was created for a college project in Game Design.

Aria's Stream Page is a romance visual novel with puzzles where the player interacts with Aria in her stream page.

The objective of the game is make people aware of the hyper sexualization of women in games and also promote the Brazilian mith of Iara in a contemporary way. 

This is a demo of the beggining of the game.

*The Game don't have a translation to English at the moment*

Ana Luiza Araujo Speda

Guilherme Corrêa Gomes Teixeira

João Pedro Obiols Devecz

José Rodrigo da Silva Souto 

Rafael Novaes Pelosi
